tool_description: Tracking multiple news sources for articles about energy prices
name: Energy Price News
title: Energy Price News

api_list.name: Articles by Single Source
api_list.description: Narrow down to a single news outlet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://energy-price-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/sources/skynews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "energy-price-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://energy-price-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/sources/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "energy-price-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
